overview:
Diane is an accomplished business executive and entrepreneur with a passion for building businesses. After 16 years at Interbrand Wood working on some of the most recognized brands in the world (Viagra, Prozac, Nissan Altima and Splenda to name a few), Diane fused her love of marketing and real estate and founded Charleston Your Home (CYH) a boutique real estate agency located in Charleston, SC. Focused on the intersection of the Internet, psychometrics and relocation, Dianeâ€™s new start-up relocality, is a stealth-mode internet based service that will disrupt the relocation landscape.
